Hi everyone!

I've downloaded this game and I had the same problem as nthorup...... But I figured out some way, heres how:

1. Unrar the archive
2. "Right Click TOED.exe"
3. Run as "administrator"

that's it!

just run the "Lemmings Evolution.exe" as an admin......

Hope it works to all....

Im sry for my last comment. I love ToeD and I got it to work and on vista you need to extract it to C:\Lemmings Revolution 3D -(direct.play)- and right click and properties and click the scuare "run as adminitrator" on the .exe files then it works realy fine with the instructions Subzero! did put in the info on top. thx so mutch m8 I love ToeD

Folks, this game works absolutely fine on a modern dual-core machine.

I found that in order to make it work I had to put the containing folder ANYWHERE on my main drive (in my case D-drive, but to most of you it will be C-drive).  It didn't work for me if I left it on my external hard drive.

Hope this helps!
:)

Last comment continued:

Oh yeah, and I don't have to 'run as administrator' or anything like that.  I just double-click the .dat file and it runs just fine.

:)

The game works doulble clicking the .bat file, but for me it has no sound?( also played second time round using the lemmings.exe)   The only sound I get is when i finish a level and the little movie plays.  tried all the compat options still no sound??  Also when the game loads, the menu wont display properly? I cant see the options its just black, I can click on them and the game starts. ???  Almost a goodie.... thanks anyway...oh im using vista home basic on an Acer amd sempron 2ghz 3500+  512mb
"painatal" you did the trick!!!!!!!

I had the problem too. I put it straight onto my main HD and it worked for me. 

Ex. C:\Lemmings Revolution 3D -(direct.play)-

Hope this helps.
